meanings.sent1: The soup was tasteable, allowing everyone to enjoy its flavor.
meanings.sent2: The ripe strawberries were tasteable and delicious.
meanings.sent3: The tasteable ice cream melted quickly under the hot sun.
meanings.sent4: The tasteable excitement in the air made the event unforgettable.
meanings.sent5: The tasteable aroma of freshly baked bread filled the room.

meanings.definition: Able to be perceived by the sense of taste.
meanings.sent1: The spices made the dish tasteable and flavorful.
meanings.sent2: The sweet candy was tasteable on her tongue.
meanings.sent3: The tasteable challenge of trying new foods was exciting.
meanings.sent4: The tasteable joy of victory lingered long after the game.
meanings.sent5: The tasteable satisfaction of a home-cooked meal was comforting.
